title: How to Open Two Beer Bottles With Each Other

steps.headline: Take two beer bottles.
steps.description: Place the first bottle on the table.

steps.headline: Take the first bottle and hold it around the neck.
Take the second bottle and hold it around the bottom of its neck.
Turn the second bottle upside down, with the bottle cap facing the table.
Place the corner or lip of the second bottle’s cap under the edge of the cap on the first.
steps.description: Make sure that you are holding the bottles tight.

steps.headline: Use pressure to release the cap of the first bottle.
Take the other bottle and hook the bottle cap on the one you just opened.
steps.description: Just hook the bottle cap on the edge of the opening of the bottle.

steps.headline: Press down to open the bottle.

text: Take two beer bottles. Place the first bottle on the table. Take the first bottle and hold it around the neck.  Take the second bottle and hold it around the bottom of its neck.  Turn the second bottle upside down, with the bottle cap facing the table.  Place the corner or lip of the second bottle’s cap under the edge of the cap on the first. Make sure that you are holding the bottles tight. Use pressure to release the cap of the first bottle.  Take the other bottle and hook the bottle cap on the one you just opened. Just hook the bottle cap on the edge of the opening of the bottle. Press down to open the bottle.  Done! Enjoy your beer!
